refnamediv.refpurpose: Gets the current active configuration setting of magic quotes gpc

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.simpara: Returns the current active configuration setting of magic_quotes_gpc (0 for off, 1 for on).

note.para: If the directive magic_quotes_sybase is ON it will completely override magic_quotes_gpc. So even when get_magic_quotes returns &true; neither double quotes, backslashes or NUL's will be escaped. Only single quotes will be escaped. In this case they'll look like: ''

refsect1.simpara: Keep in mind that magic_quotes_gpc can not be set at runtime.
See also addslashes, stripslashes, get_magic_quotes_runtime, and ini_get.
